demos.name: xPC Target
demos.description:
xPC Target is a Target for Real-Time Workshop supporting PC-compatible target systems like desktop PCs, PC/104, SBC or CompactPCI. It is used for Rapid-Prototyping, Hardware-in-the-loop simulations and application generation for embedded systems in small quantities.

The demos presented here require a target machine to be set up before they will run. Use the xpcsetup command to activate the setup GUI.

All the demos are located in
<MATLABROOT>\toolbox\rtw\targets\xpc\xpcdemos.
You may type
>> help xpcdemos
for a list of the demos, or type
>> help <demoname>
for more details about each demo.

The source code for the demos may be used as a template for your own scripts.
